title: Calum's Showcase
description: Hello there, it is such a pleasure to meet you!

body.raw:
[![](https://i.ibb.co/qrx5Yyk/Website-1.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

# Simplifying QSR Operations Through Technology

I'm a technology enthusiast focused on streamlining Quick Service Restaurant operations through innovative digital solutions.

Since encountering McDonald's innovative fingerprint authentication system in 2015, I have dedicated my career to advancing technological solutions in the Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) industry. My passion lies in developing digital tools and systems that enhance operational efficiency and workforce productivity. Through continuous innovation, I strive to transform traditional QSR processes, creating solutions that streamline operations and reduce inefficiencies across the food service sector.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/QnMK58X/Website.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**A few tech stacks that always get me excited:**

[![](https://i.ibb.co/z4KzN3Q/Website-1.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**Industry tools that get me going in the morning:**

[![](https://i.ibb.co/TLd1SpR/Website.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**Artificial Intelligence I find interesting:**

[![](https://i.ibb.co/SxF9QhF/Website.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**You can ask me:**

> Calum, we need to brainstorm a few ideas on how to effectively deliver the training for the new M5 coming up. Can you get us a quick Canvas to collaborate together?

[![](https://i.ibb.co/f8Y6Rr3/Website-1.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**What I can do for you:**

> Leverage aider-chat's efficient development capabilities to generate customizable, ready-to-use collaborative canvases. Powered with Anthropic and/or OpenAI API, aider-chat excels in rapidly delivering tailored, functional tools that accommodate your specific requirements and can be implemented immediately.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/25kB3vG/ezgif-1-dcf9943eb0.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**You can ask me:**

> Calum, we need to implement a system that allows stores to monitor their RCP metrics and benchmark their performance against company standards!

[![](https://i.ibb.co/1GvmCgY/Website-2.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**What I can do for you:**

> Develop a customized internal system to track store RCP metrics and benchmark performance against evolving company standards using modern web technologies like React and Next.js.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/zSMnz12/ezgif-6-7caef31d39.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**You can ask me:**

> Calum, we need a system to help GMs effectively manage their teams through accountability tracking, employee recognition, and professional development planning.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/MhcWSbx/Website.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**What I can do for you:**

> Create a streamlined team management system by integrating Google Sheets and Canva, featuring cross-training scores, automated coaching logs, point tracking, availability monitoring, and customizable templates for visualization, promoting clear team communication.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/HTpKccN/ezgif-2-a753702545.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

> Harness the power of the Google ecosystem by connecting AppSheet with Google Sheets, giving you and your team instant mobile access to manage operations from anywhere, at any time.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/sJmdfW9/Untitled-design-1.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**You can ask me:**

> Calum, we need training materials!

[![](https://i.ibb.co/YcDXRdL/Website-1.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)

**What I can do for you:**

> Create engaging training videos using real-world footage, featuring relevant scenarios that prepare both Team Members and Management to handle actual workplace situations effectively.

[![](https://i.ibb.co/QYRXxLS/ezgif-1-79bd103897.gif)](https://calumnguyen.vercel.app)
